评论详情: Fits perfectly! It's comfortable, stretchy, flattering, vibrant in color, overall great material
This top is so cute! I’ve looked for a top similar to this & I couldn’t find one. The material is good and the fit is even better! Worth buying!
This is super cute, thick, good quality, have worn multiple times. The red is a very nice deep cherry red color. Good quality for the money.
This top is fitted but so flattering. I like that it can be worn on either shoulder (there is no tag in the back so there’s no designated front/back) and is very comfortable. True to size
The fabric is nice and soft, it’s pretty stretchy, but it has an odd fit to it. Gaps weirdly at the neckline

I get compliments every time I wear this top, especially when paired with blue jeans.  Top is sized perfectly, the red color is vibrant and has washed and worn well over the past summer.  Will definitely order in another color.
I sized up because I wanted to be able to tuck it into my skort and didn’t want it to be compression like. It fit nicely and was cute!  5’10 and 160lbs for reference

I bought this top in my recommend size as per the size chart (small). However after trying it on I soon realized it was far too big in the bust area and would fall down on the shoulder with no sleeve. I have bought many one shoulder tops and have never had this happen. I would recommend trying a different top or sizing down if you are a small chested girly.

I’m 5’5 125-130lbs natural 34DD and the SMALl is perfect for me. I’m not a skinny frothy little bubble of a gal and the S is just right - meaning the fabric has give - it looks really nice on, not tacky tight or cheap whatsoever. In fact my daughter thought it was a high end brand and loved it - so I got one for her too! She is 34B 130-135 lbs and the SMALL fits her perfectly too. There’s enough stretch that even if you’re usually a M the S would fit. If you want a more generous fit than “body con” style I’d size up. Totally recommend.

Nice quality, fit a little large under the arms. I run smaller on my top so …. It was nothing a little strip of fabric taped didn’t fix to keep my bra from peeking  out of the side without the shoulder.

I really wanted to love this top! It is a beautiful material but the side under my arm runs big and there’s a gap so it didn’t work for me. I don’t even have small chest so I’m not sure why it fits like that. It fit elsewhere. I was bummed I had to return it because the material is soft and it appears more expensive than the price point.
I loved it
Is thick ans color fades very fast. I don’t wash my clothes after every wear either. Not just the color but the entire shirt looks older after just a few wears
Size S, fits perfectly, thick material
Reliable one shoulder top. Good quality.
It can literally go with anything , skirt, jeans, shorts, dressy plants. It is stretchable material

评论概述: I love this top! Solid, cute and comfortable.
评论详情: Fit is Nice. I might take it in a tiny bit so it doesnt reveal anything. That’s the only thing :) Fabric is sporty and comfortable. Scrunch is flattering. Length is nice. Love!
I love wearing this top with high waisted jeans for going out drinking, super sexy!
Loved the fit and material.  It’s true to size and the perfect summer asymmetrical top.
A little tight (as expected) but mainly too short:/

I’m very picky with my clothing but I love this top . The material is the perfect thickness! Not too thin! Not to thick! I alternate between medium and large but I steer away from tight fitting things just because I do have a lil bit of rolls I’m trying to get rid of lol so I went with the large so if you don’t like too tight just go up a size . Buy this as an essential piece for your closet!

It didn't look the same as in the picture once put on. It was big & loose in areas it needed tightening & tight in the areas that needed to be loose. I also wasn't a fan of the fabric; collected lint almost instantaneously.

Love this top. Can be dressed up with a skirt or dress or down for a more casual look with jeans. I struggle with tops because I have a larger chest and smaller waist and usually need to wear a bra. I can wear a one shoulder sports bra under this which makes it extra comfy!

评论概述: I did not expect it to look this good

This is a super cute top, and the fabric is thick and durable without being too hot or heavy. Love it!
Wasn’t expecting to love this top so much, super good quality and fit perfect. Also really good pricing and the material is soft.
Love this top. Very comfy. I didn’t need a bra. Such a good price point. Would buy again.
Perfect going out top, Super stretchy
Fit just right and looks exactly as shown.
Fabric was comfortable and fit was good.
it’s so soft, great quality and fits perfectly! great for going out or just casual!
Material is good quality and fit is super flattering. I am 34B and Small fits perfect !
Well made top, good material. I was pleasantly surprised.
Ordered in black and the material is soft and nice quality.  Shirt is true to size.
Good quality and fits me perfectly
I love this top. It fits perfectly!! Just buy it you will not be disappointed.I’m Definitely going to buy more colors.I got a large
The actual shirt is good quality and even double lined over the chest area to not be see-through, but it came with two stains on it :(
Perfect for night out or concert. Fits true to size. Soft material.
Perfect one-shoulder comfortable top for going out or a casual look as well. Size down if you are between sizes. Thin and comfortable material.
Fits great. Fabric is nice. It is just the right length.
Cute for my 21 year old daughter!
I liked the material and it looked very cute :)

评论概述: Es casual….de buena calidad …. Tiene doble forro en la parte del brasier…
评论详情: Me encantó
I ordered this top and it’s cute but then I found it on Alixpress for 6.99….what a rip off.

i love single strap tops and this one is crunched and cute, but for me it lays a little odd and doesn’t feel quite right. the shoulder strap doesn’t have a flattering style, but probably more because of my wide shoulders than because of the style of shirt. would be cute on a small, petite build!
This takes a little adjustment to make it look right, but overall it's a cute top.

Large fits a 5'3", 135lb, 34DD stature well enough. The fabric is soft, stretchy, but still form-fitted, due to the 'cinched' waist it does have a more cropped feel. Once on the top is on the cut does seem to fall lower under my arm than I expected, and with the cut being so unique it can be hard finding a bra that works with this. I do think that this would work better for friends in the itty bitty committee. May have been better to have gotten a medium to prevent any extra side seepage or even to have compressed more, and potentially be able to skip the bra.

Ordered in recommended size medium and it fits good. I don't have many one-shoulder tops and I'm always looking to add some to my closet. Knocked a star off for the weird smell when I opened the package and because I ordered it in white (which is my go to color) but don't like it as much as I thought I would. Based on other reviewer photos, I think the black would've been better instead. Also knocked a star because even though this isn't a bad top, it isn't the greatest. Still would recommend to anyone who actually likes wearing one shoulders — maybe order in a darker color!
Love love love. I love the material. Very flattering

I like the one-shoulder design, so I purchased this top with high hopes. Even after sizing up, it turned out to be too short for my long torso. However, I must say that the material, stretch, design, and overall fit (except for the length) are great. If you prefer a very cropped crop top, this might be perfect for you. If not, you may want to find one that offers more coverage while still fitting well.

This top is so cute! It gives the perfect amount of stretch while still being fitted to your body and isn't see through at all. You can even wear this shirt with or without a bra since it has an extra piece of fabric over the torso area. This top is also cropped, but is still a flattering length. Overall, I was very pleased with the product. Highly recommend!

I was worried the shoulderless part would slip down or be too low for me but It fits great, absolutely love this shirt! I went on a run with it and it was very comfy. It’s nicely fitted too, not too long or too short in length. I’m back on here to buy different colors of this same shirt. FYI, I got a small, I’m slim, 5ft, 120 lbs.

This top is high quality, it is a thick material that is velvety soft. The top is lined, and I was able to wear it without a bra, the support from the material is high. I was very impressed with this top. I am 5'7" 140lbs, I ordered a small, and the top fits perfectly. This top is not cropped, I tucked it in making it appear as a bodysuit. I highly recommend this top.

This top is a nice one shoulder top.  I found it to be true to size.  It is stretchy and fitted, but not too tight.  The fabric feels nice and soft, and it is double layered on the top (shelf bra).  If you want to change it up from a basic T, this is a solid choice.  It's a good looking top and it will be great for warm summer nights.The top is well put together and nicely stitched.

I couldn’t believe the quality of this shirt when it came in the mail. I got a medium, I sized down (usually a large) and the material was great, wasn’t too tight. You can wear this with a bra or without as the shirt has a lining in the chest area. Perfect for brunch or date night outfits

I’m 5’2”, 20lbs, very small chest, the small fits okay but I probably could have gone with the XS because the chest is a little baggy (no bra) The rouched sides add extra to the top, makes it feel like it’s perfect for a night out. Material is super soft, stretchy and so comfortable.
So cute and so soft!! Fits just as expected. Seems high end for such a great price.
Incredibly soft and thick fabricate. However, I have a feeling I am going to be really hot in the summertime with the thick fabric. Love the half sleeve and black matches everything.
Soft material, I ordered a large. If you are big busted size up! Runs small. Still recommend, its a cute top

评论概述: not a crop top as said in title but still cute.
评论详情: This is such a cute top, impressed by the quality of this top. The material is soft and comfortable, seems to be good quality. The top half of the inside is lined. Thick fabric, light enough to breath but not see-through or sheer. Fits me perfectly. Great price, great top, I recommend buying.
This top is super sexy and comfortable

This one shoulder crop top is the cutest! It is soft and stretchy, is lined inside with a built in bra and is so comfortable. It washes nice (I didn't put it in the dryer but instead hung dry to avoid shrinkage). It looks so nice on and is thicker material than I thought it would be. I am definitely surprised at the quality of this shirt.

The shirt it soft and comfortable. The top half is lined on both front and back. Perfect for causal or for going out.  The color is not jet black. It is slightly on the gray side.  I am 32B, and the S-size shirt feels a tiny bit bigger than I want it to be. However, I don't need to send it out to have it altered.

This cute little crop top looks great and it's comfortable too. The fabric feels nice and the construction quality is very good. It's fully lined so it’s not too thin or see-through but it’s still light enough to breathe. You can also wear it on either shoulder because the front and back are essentially identical. Love it!

评论概述: Size up if you have a long torso or larger chest
评论详情: This top is exactly how the picture looks and is quite comfortable. I wish I did size up once though just because I have a longer torso and larger chest but it is really stretchy so getting my exact size was okay still. The fabric used is really soft and doesn’t damage in the wash on a regular cycle. I usually hang dry this just to keep it looking nice for multiple wears.
Fabric is perfect. Fits beautiful. 34 bust and 28 waist, got a size small

I really like this top. It’s super comfy. It also has a built in bra. It is stretchy and god quality. It is not to cropped. It stops right at a typical waist band of your pants. I really like it and recommend.
Love this shirt!! It’s not super white more like an off-white or cream color.  The chest part is double lined which I love.  The fit is perfect and the shirt is very versatile!
